Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay!”
Reviews.Author: lydia c
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed 3 nights december 2011 hotel greatly exceeded expectations reading awful reviews time ive written review stand lovely hotel comments id read star anyway expect clean comfortable shower comfortable bed pleasant helpful staff cheap hotel city break location fantastic walk main attractions rome hotel whoever dark alley poo definately lying charming brilliant trip definately stay

Reviews.Title: “I had no problems at all here!!”

Reviews.Content: teenager daughter 11 november rome girly trip stayed santa worried read reviews saying inn dark alley human poop load rubbish hotel ideally situated sort walk collesseum shorter walk termini station staff nice helpful clean wonderful stay intend return nect husband short five star luxery hotel book feel leave rotten reviews

Reviews.Title: “Only seasoned budget travelers will value location over discomfort here”
Reviews.Author: GianlucaMarcellino
Reviews.Content: location santa maria maggiore start via merulana reasonably near termini train station discomforts expected budgeted considering price rome hotel market size basic furniture fittings lack elevator access dirty busy alley countrys average appear dangerous people unfamiliar italian version western civilization tidy surroundings considerate neighbours refurbished cleaner previous reviews especially dependance alley appear downright nice speaking size window size 316 uncomfortable previous reviewer check 306 book explicitly rule 306 annoying feature stay shabby service including sending luggage flight stairs wrong acceptable guest arrive forgetting assign leaving settle 306 yes makes 316 look posh
